thread.title: Gossip & Rumours: Zlatan Ibrahimovic reveals present he gave his wife on Christmas day
thread.title_full: Gossip & Rumours: Zlatan Ibrahimovic reveals present he gave his wife on Christmas day

title: Gossip & Rumours: Zlatan Ibrahimovic reveals present he gave his wife on Christmas day
text:
By Game Yetu   10:32 [PHOTO: COURTESY] 
Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic has unearthed he gave his wife a framed picture of himself as a Christmas present, according to the Sun. 
Ibrahimovic added that he handed his model wife Helena Seger, 46, the gift showing him celebrating a goal. 
It shows him jump above team-mate Jesse Lingard to celebrate his goal against West Brom. 
The shot, taken during the 2-0 win a week before Christmas, is famed for Lingard looking terrified as the striker jumps towards him. 
The pair met in 2002 and four years later brought their first son, Maximilian, into the world. In 2008, second son Vincent was born. 
Ibrahimovic and Seger also own a family bulldog called Trustor.
